name: Lumont
description: A courageous Tank who is skilled at absorbing damage and melee combat.

ultimate.name: Lumont's Charge
ultimate.description: Lumont selects a tile in range and charges at it, knocking enemies in his path toward the selected tile. When he reaches the selected tile, Lumont deals 240% damage to all surrounding enemies and taunts them for 3s. Lamont is unaffected while casting the skill.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases damage to 260%.
Increases the duration of taunt to 4s.
Increases damage to 280%.
Increases damage to 300%.

skill_1.name: Totem Power
skill_1.description: Lumont harnesses the Totem Power, gaining a shield that can block 450% damage for 12s. For every adjacent enemy, the shield value is increased by 30%. He also increases Phys DEF of 2 closest allies by 30% for 7s.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases the shield value by 35% for every adjacent enemy.
Increases the shield value by 40% for every adjacent enemy.
Increases the shield value by 45% for every adjacent enemy.

skill_2.name: War Stomp
skill_2.description: Lumont stomps the ground, dealing 240% damage to adjacent enemies and stunning them for 1s.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases damage to 260%.
Reduces this skill's cooldown by 1s for every enemy hit.
Increases damage to 280%.

hero_focus.name: Hero Focus
hero_focus.description: Lumont increases his Haste by 9 during battle. His Haste is increased by an extra 6 when there are at least 2 enemies nearby.

upgrades.upgrade: Lumont increases his Haste by 12 during battle. His Haste is increased by an extra 8 when there are at least 2 enemies nearby.
Lumont increases his Haste by 15 during battle. His Haste is increased by an extra 10 when there are at least 2 enemies nearby.

ex_skill.name: Rage
ex_skill.description: Lumont smashes the ground with totem 3 times after receiving damage equal to 40% of his max HP, dealing 150% damage to enemies within 1, 2, and 3 tiles in order and reducing their ATK by 25% for 6s. Lamont is unaffected while casting the skill.

upgrades.upgrade: An extra skill attempt is granted when a battle starts or an ally is defeated for the first time.
Increases damage to 180%.
Increases damage to 210%.

enhance_force.name: Enhance Force
enhance_force.description: Lumont recovers 7% of his max HP per second while shielded by Totem Power.

season_skill.name: Heart of Unity
season_skill.description: Increases Haste by 8 for all deployed allies if they are alive 10s into a battle, until the end of the battle. Increases the damage dealt by all deployed allies by 8% if they are alive 40s into a battle.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases Haste by 10 and damage dealt to 9%.
Increases Haste by 10 and damage dealt to 10%.
Increases Haste by 10 and damage dealt to 11%.
Increases Haste by 10 and damage dealt to 12%.
Increases Haste by 10 and damage dealt to 13%.
Increases Haste by 10 and damage dealt to 14%.
Increases Haste by 10 and damage dealt to 15%.
